abstract: A preview of games on TV this weekend involving United States national team players.

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team

lead_paragraph: There is a delightful scent of autumn in the air. Not too hot, not too cold -- you can feel that late October snap and the extra burst of brightness and color and energy that comes with it.

headline.main: Weekend TV Guide: Oct. 22-23: Seven Reasons to Stay Inside
